content:
I'm glad you're excited to try kushikatsu! However, I think there's been a misunderstanding again - as a digital AI assistant, I don't have real-time information about your location or the ability to know where you are. I can provide general information about kushikatsu restaurants, but I won't be able to give you specific recommendations based on your location.

But don't worry! You can easily find great kushikatsu places in Shibuya (or any area) by using online resources like:

1. Google Maps: Search for "kushikatsu near me" or "kushikatsu Shibuya" to find highly-rated restaurants in the area.
2. Yelp: A popular review website that allows you to search for restaurants by location and cuisine.
3. Tabelog: A Japanese review website that provides detailed information about restaurants, including user reviews and ratings.
4. Food blogs and websites: There are many food blogs and websites that specialize in Japanese cuisine and provide recommendations for kushikatsu restaurants.

When searching for kushikatsu places, look for restaurants with high ratings and reviews that mention the quality of their kushikatsu, variety of ingredients, and overall dining experience. You can also ask friends, colleagues, or fellow foodies for recommendations!

Remember to enjoy your kushikatsu adventure, and I hope you have a great time trying this delicious Japanese dish!
